 are covered.

Description:
Describes the risk versus benefit approach, sources of radiation, interactions of radiation with matter, cell
 structure and function and effects of radiation on them, acute and chronic effects, somatic and genetic effects,
 radiation quantities and units, radiation protection organizations and regulations, stochastic and non stochastic
 effects, limits of exposure, methods of protecting patients, public and workers, shielding and dosimetry
 methods and dose reduction in imaging modalities.
